program.description: Ep. 317. Whaaaat. Captain Man and Kid Danger are each stuck in a hole. Charlotte and Jasper better go help, 'cuz Schwoz is takin' a bean bath!
Ep. 101. Henry Hart is an average 8th grader until he lands his dream job as sidekick to superhero Captain Man, which he must keep a secret.
Ep. 322. After seeing a cute guy but missing her chance to meet him, Phoebe accesses the Hero League’s villain search software to track him down. However.

Ep. 323. Phoebe’s newest superhero mission is to babysit President Kuckbutt’s troublemaking teen daughter, but the assignment quickly snowballs out of control when Phoebe’s charge sneaks into the town’s illegal nightclub.
Ep. 105. When the Turtles sneak out against Splinter’s wishes (to go to a movie with April) , they battle Baxter Stockman, a deranged inventor in mechanical battle armor.
Ep. 106. Weary of using his simple bo staff to fight the technologically advanced Kraang, Donatello creates Metalhead, a remote-controlled robot turtle, to fight in his place.
Ep. 149. Sponge. Bob and Patrick take a friendship test. // Pearl is embarrassed when she must sit next to Sponge. Bob in the Tunnel of Glove.
Ep. 150. Mr. Krabs decides to start selling hot dogs instead of Krabby Patties. // Sponge. Bob and Patrick discover a lost ship.
Ep. 145. Vicky decides to be an actress and makes Timmy help her land her first role. // Dad accidentally flushes Timmy and the fairies down the toilet.
Ep. 146. Poof finally becomes a fairy godparent. Unfortunately, it’s to Mrs. Crocker.
Ep. 314. When Miss Shapen’s niece, Noelle, comes into town and chooses Jasper over Henry, Henry discovers that Noelle has much bigger plans than just going out to dinner with Jasper.

Ep. 315. Ray agrees to let Henry fly his helicopter, but it's too much for Ray when he starts to act like a nervous parent. Charlotte, Jasper, and Piper find a cotton candy machine in Junk-N-Stuff and start making cotton candy.

Ep. 320. After going back to their elementary school to complete a hero assessment exam, Phoebe & Max realize passing a 5th grade test won’t be easy when the instructor is a former classmate that Max tormented when they were younger.

Ep. 321. Despite promising his girlfriend he would stop pranking, Max pulls an epic gag which his friend gets blamed for. As the school’s principal moves to expel the boy, Max must fix the situation while still keeping his role a secret.
Ep. 406. Emma tries her best to restore Daniel’s memory but time is running out. Jax meets his long lost sister.

Ep. 102. Harvey and Foo rent a bike from a grumpy shopkeeper and learn the meaning of the phrase "Buyer Beware. " // Always excluded from Valentine’s Day festivities, Fee makes up her own holiday - Anti-Valentine’s Day!

Ep. 709. Dora’s on her way to the doctor’s for her yearly check up! We won't be making this visit on our own, we soon meet friends who need to go to the doctor, too! Dora inspires her new friends with bravery to help them also be brave.

Ep. 103. When Leah wishes for help making cupcakes for a bake sale, she and the genies find themselves stuck with a giant birthday cake, some farm animals, and a river of cupcake batter. How will Leah finish without any wishes left?

Ep. 321. Despite promising his girlfriend he would stop pranking, Max pulls an epic gag which his friend gets blamed for. As the school’s principal moves to expel the boy, Max must fix the situation while still keeping his role a secret.
Ep. 406. Emma tries her best to restore Daniel’s memory but time is running out. Jax meets his long lost sister.

Ep. 102. Harvey and Foo rent a bike from a grumpy shopkeeper and learn the meaning of the phrase "Buyer Beware. " // Always excluded from Valentine’s Day festivities, Fee makes up her own holiday - Anti-Valentine’s Day!

Ep. 709. Dora’s on her way to the doctor’s for her yearly check up! We won't be making this visit on our own, we soon meet friends who need to go to the doctor, too! Dora inspires her new friends with bravery to help them also be brave.

Ep. 103. When Leah wishes for help making cupcakes for a bake sale, she and the genies find themselves stuck with a giant birthday cake, some farm animals, and a river of cupcake batter. How will Leah finish without any wishes left?
Ep. 105. A new girl moves to the kingdom - with a big secret to hide. // Nella tracks down Garrett’s childhood dragon friend for a birthday surprise.

Ep. 209. When stunt pilot Ace runs into engine trouble, It’s up to Skye and the Пес патрул to save her and her plane so the air show can go on! // After a big storm, the Пес патрул must save Farmer Yumi's barn in time for his wedding!

Ep. 209. When stunt pilot Ace runs into engine trouble, It’s up to Skye and the Пес патрул to save her and her plane so the air show can go on! // After a big storm, the Пес патрул must save Farmer Yumi's barn in time for his wedding!

Ep. 114. Blaze and AJ are deep in the woods when they discover and befriend a mud-loving monster truck named Gasquatch. Now, they must set out on an epic adventure to bring their new friend to Mud Fest… the muddiest party of all time.
Ep. 122. Alvin is tired of seeing his celebrity status overshadowed by Reality TV stars. So, he decides to become one himself. Just one problem, Alvin has to film Dave without him knowing.
Ep. 137. Mr. Krabs finds out that Plankton's afraid of whales. // Gary falls for a snail named Mary.
Ep. 138. Mr. Krab opens a Dinner Theater at the Krusty Krab. // Sponge. Bob takes his pals to Texas to see Sandy in a squirrel rodeo.
Ep. 139. Plankton disguises himself as Sponge. Bob’s grandmother. // Mr. Krabs uses Gary to find spare change.

Ep. 101. Bunsen attends his first day of human Middle School in hopes to prove that beasts and humans can happily co-exist. // Bunsen literally loses his head on picture day and now Mikey has to help him find it before picture time.
Ep. 109. After April receives a warning from her imprisoned father, she and the Turtles embark on a mission to save him and stop the Kraang from detonating a mutagen bomb in the city.
Ep. 110. The Turtles must defend their home in the sewers when Bradford tries to destroy it with a dangerous chemical.

Ep. 136. Dad refuses to sell Sparky to his boss so he makes Dad’s life miserable at work. Timmy and Sparky hatch a plan. // Timmy wishes his ancestors had picked different careers. Timmy’s family becomes rich and spoiled.
Ep. 137. Timmy, his dad, and fairies get stuck in a board game created by Cosmo. // Timmy wishes Sparky would get a chance to be heroic. Dad thinks he can talk to animals.
Ep. 162. Sponge. Bob and Patrick get caught in the feud between a crew of ghost pirates and the Flying Dutchman.
Ep. 163. Mermaidman and Barnacleboy let Sponge. Bob and Patrick in on their secret, heroic origins! // Using Sponge. Bob’s DNA, Plantkon grows himself a second eye…and becomes nice!

Ep. 108. It’s time to restock the secret Krabby Patty ingredient, and it is Sponge. Bob’s duty to make sure the ingredient is delivered safely to the Krusty Krab. // Plankton has a customer who eats at the Chum Bucket every day.
Ep. 310. Phoebe babysits her boyfriend's shy brother, but the mild mannered boy discovers his evil side when he gets his hands on one of Max's inventions.

Ep. 311. A desperate Phoebe distracts Max from interfering with her class project by convincing him that a girl at school wants to go out with him. But after Max and his date realize they’ve been conned, they seek revenge.
Ep. 202. The urban legend of Pigfoot takes over Edgewood when Dawn fakes a story for her column on the school’s website. Even the boys get in on the Pigfoot action.

Ep. 203. The Quads turn their garage into an awesome hangout space, making their house the place to be. But when a notorious one-upper opens a competing hangout, the Quads have to work together to top her and regain their social status.

Ep. 117. When a rival rapper releases a track about Double G, the Геймърки convince Dub to release a response track, dissing his dog. The response enrages the rapper and he comes to confront Double G. Game Component: Pick It, Scratch It.
Ep. 118. Triple G's mom Jackie invites the Геймърки on her yacht to see fireworks. But she and Double G have doubled booked the yacht, causing Dub to compete with her for the kids' affection.
Ep. 110. The Guardians receive a new shield building assignment but are partnered with different WITs. Also, while under a spell, Luke tries to woo Andi.
Ep. 151. A new neighbor moves in and becomes Squidward’s best friend. // Sponge. Bob helps Squidward prepare for a date.
Ep. 140. A monster terrorizes Bikini Bottom until Patrick befriends the huge creature. // Sponge. Bob and all the Bikini Bottom citizens disappear to an underwater resort.

Ep. 102. Bunsen, Mikey, and Amanda (disguised as a beast) play the beast version of "Hide and Go Seek" in Bunsen’s house. // Bunsen’s love of ice cream almost gets him expelled when Amanda uses it to lure him out of school.
Ep. 139. Dad and Crocker make a deal. As a result, Crocker becomes best friends with Dinkleberg. // Timmy wishes up 5000 Timmys for the Planet of the Dads. The Timmys kidnap Cosmo and Wanda.
Ep. 108. Trouble follows Henry home from his superhero life when a piece of rock from outer space turns out to be more than it seems.

Ep. 211. Phoebe and Max worry they will be stuck hanging out together all the time when their friends start to spend time with each other. The twins go to great lengths to make sure that they all have a bad experience at the movies.
Ep. 124. While at Tech Fest, the Геймърки enlist the Girls Who Code to help them take down an old enemy of Double G’s who has returned seeking revenge.

Ep. 111. Sponge. Bob and his friends are swept away by a giant wave and find themselves stranded on a remote tropical island. To get back to Bikini Bottom, they need to learn how to surf from enigmatic surf guru, Jack Kahuna Lagun.
Ep. 202. Alvin befriends a lonely new kid in school, but Theodore discovers that the new student may not be who he says he is.
Ep. 203. Alvin reluctantly signs up to teach the after school music class, but finds his classmates treat him differently as a teacher.

Ep. 212. Harvey thinks he’s ready to rock out at his first concert, but is he really ready? /When the Lake Spirit gets a promotion, Harvey must convince him that Littlebark is too great of a town to leave!
Ep. 208. Randl takes Fee under his wing and teaches her the family business. Fee and Foo enter an arm wrestling competition to prove they’re the strongest in Littlebark.
Ep. 139. Dad and Crocker make a deal. As a result, Crocker becomes best friends with Dinkleberg. // Timmy wishes up 5000 Timmys for the Planet of the Dads. The Timmys kidnap Cosmo and Wanda.
Ep. 140. Crocker tries to trigger Sparky with a secret word. // Catman confuses Sparky for his old arch-nemesis Dogman.

Ep. 316. The Quads accidentally force out the easygoing gym teacher ruining the class for everyone. They think they’ve fixed everything with the perfect substitutes: Tom and Anne, but soon realize their parents have made things worse!
Ep. 111. The mysterious intruder reveals himself. Andi reconsiders going out with Luke and finds the perfect object to make her shield triumph beyond the rest.
Ep. 153. When Squidward gets hurt at work, he threatens legal action unless Mr

Ep. 154. Mr. Krabs tries to make even more money by turning a hole in the Krusty Krab wall into a cash-making drive-thru window! // Tony Fast Jr., the son of a famous race car driver, tries to teach Sponge. Bob how to drive.
Ep. 109. After April receives a warning from her imprisoned father, she and the Turtles embark on a mission to save him and stop the Kraang from detonating a mutagen bomb in the city.
Ep. 110. The Turtles must defend their home in the sewers when Bradford tries to destroy it with a dangerous chemical.
Ep. 149. Cosmo and Wanda take Timmy on a trip back in time to meet some of their past Godkids. But things take a turn for the worst when Timmy interacts with the past and alters the future!

Ep. 150. When Jorgen discovers that Cosmo never graduated from the Fairy Academy, he threatens to take away his job as Fairy Godparent. To solve the mystery of what happened, the gang looks through Cosmo’s memories of his teenage years.
Ep. 102. Henry Hart is an average 8th grader until he lands his dream job as sidekick to superhero Captain Man, which he must keep a secret.
Ep. 103. As Henry tries to adjust to his new role as Kid Danger, he struggles to balance his schedule between crime fighting, school, family and friends.

Ep. 324. Hank and Phoebe think the house has been robbed when they return home and discover the furniture missing, but Max admits he hid everything and forces them to earn their belongings back before Barb discovers the truth.
Ep. 325. When Chloe announces that Max is her favorite sibling, Phoebe tries to show her the "real" Max by telling a Robin Hood-style bedtime story about the great Phoebe Hood and the evil Maxingham.
Ep. 107. Donatello and April investigate a scientist's disappearance, but discover a conspiracy regarding a bizarre psychic monkey instead.
